data.name: Sample - Recorded Future - 1.0.1
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Recorded Future" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: URL : Lookup URL
workflows.description: Look up threat intel context for a URL

arguments.title: Recorded Future : Get URL Risk List
Recorded Future : Get Vulnerability Risk List

workflows.name: Vulnerability : Lookup Vulnerability
workflows.description: Look up threat intel context for a CVE vulnerability identifier

arguments.title: Recorded Future : Get IP Risk List

workflows.name: Vulnerability : Search Vulnerabilities
workflows.description: Search for a CVE vulnerabilities identifiers

arguments.title: Recorded Future : Get File Risk Lists

workflows.name: Get Risk Rules
workflows.description: List risk rules for selected input

arguments.title: Recorded Future : Get Domain Risk List

workflows.name: Alert: Search Alert Rules
workflows.description: List alert rules based on search  input

workflows.name: Malware : Lookup Malware
workflows.description: Lookup threat intel context for malware

workflows.name: Malware : Search Malware
workflows.description: Search for threat intel context of malware

workflows.name: Domain : Get Domain Reputation
workflows.description: Look up threat intel context for a domain

workflows.name: IP : Get IP Reputation
workflows.description: Look up threat intel context for IP address

workflows.name: File : Get File Reputation
workflows.description: Look up threat intel context for a file identity hash (MD5, SHA1 or SHA-256)
